page.title: 18The Lakeland Village.
page.content: This is a timeshare comlex situated in and around an old industrial estate. The Building which now houses the White water Hotel was first built as a cotton mill. Since then it has been a bobbin mill and Ultramarine works before it was converted into a hotel in 1984. In timeshare you buy a house for 80 years but you can only use it for one week per year. Other weeks someone else uses it. The Lakeland Village Consists of: Timeshare cottages. The Whitewater Hotel. Champneys-Sports complex.
